text: 28 Days is a 2000 American comedy-drama movie directed by Betty Thomas and written by Susannah Grant and starring Sandra Bullock, Viggo Mortensen, Dominic West, Elizabeth Perkins, Azura Skye, Steve Buscemi, Diane Ladd. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. == Other websites == * * Category:2000 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Betty Thomas
title: 28 Days
